title: Witch Hazel
author: Archivist Eryndra
pages: Witch Hazel unveils potions crafted with care and precision, guiding alchemists to channel transformative powers.
Her writings blend mystic allure with practicality, each concoction promising to enhance both survival and experience.
Hazel's nine affable books speak to those who seek magic's essence, perfecting the art of potion-making for adventurers young and seasoned.
